page.title: 07LIFE AS A TRAVELLER PART 2
page.content: My sisters and I have breakfast. Linda & I usually have an egg on toast. Sometimes we have cereal & then my sister Carol. Anne takes my sister & I to the village hall. My sister goes for Robert & they walk down to the bus stop & they catch the bus to the Abbey School. I get on the coach & then go to school. When we come back at night I have to go to Daniel's house and then my sister will pick me up. Then we go home and my mum will do the tea. We might sit up in the caravan and eat it or we might sit on the grass and eat it. We have three cars. My brother & sister & my dad have a car. We have three caravans. One is 14ft; one is 24 ft; and one is 36 ft. My brother's is 24 ft.
